EmailTemplate.name: New Project! (1344288591.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: New Project! (1344288591.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Martin, A little bird told me you have a new project coming up that you liked to run through MBO – that’s great. Ok, it wasn’t a little bird, Steve Arhancet send this over to me: H Steve, I'm moving into consulting and planning on using MBO Partners as soon as I can get this first deal to close. Would love to connect. I can use all the guruing I can get!
- Marty Bradley, PMI-ACP Let’s connect and talk about next steps. Feel free to call my directly or you may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. I look forward to catching up! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
